member.summary: Tries to get the relevant type of an entity set, singleton, or composable function import.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.ResourceAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that indicates a property is an entity set or singleton. If the property type is IQueryable, it will be built as entity set or it will be built as singleton. The name will be same as property name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that indicates a method is an OData Operation (Function or Action).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace of the operation. The default value will be same as the namespace of entity type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute.EntitySet
member.summary: Gets or sets the entity set associated with the operation result. Only need to be set for unbound operations when there are multiple entity sets with same entity type as result entity type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute.IsComposable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the function is composable. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute.IsBound
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation is bound or not. If it is set to true, then no matter what's the first parameter, it will be considered as bound. If it is set to false, then no matter what's the first parameter, it will be considered as unbound. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Restier.Publishers.OData.Model.OperationAttribute.HasSideEffects
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation has side effects. If an operation does not have side effect, it means it is a function, and need to use HTTP Get to call function. If an operation has side effect, it means it is an action, and need to use HTTP post to call action. The default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether there is permission to write the property

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the total number of items should be retrieved when the result has been filtered using paging operators.
member.remarks: Setting this to true may have a performance impact as the data provider may need to execute two independent queries.
